distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for wavpack fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-19840: Fixed a denial-of-service in the WavpackPackInit function from pack_utils.c (bsc#1120930)
notes.title: Description of the patch

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP4

notes.text: The function WavpackPackInit in pack_utils.c in libwavpack.a in WavPack through 5.1.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (resource exhaustion caused by an infinite loop) via a crafted wav audio file because WavpackSetConfiguration64 mishandles a sample rate of zero.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
